name: snacman
description:
Snacman. Snake + pacman, but not really. Made by Aidan Sojourner and I for Cruzhacks 2021 (and we didn't even lose much sleep over it.) Press space to switch walls/cross gaps, press shift to fast-forward, press R to restart. Try to collect all the yerba mate cans without getting too many Fs.

Dirt tiles by Lanea Zimmerman via https://opengameart.org/content/dirt-platformer-tiles

Made using https://www.raylib.com/
